data.title: California Notices Emergency Cannabis Regulations Requiring QR Code Certificate
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – Today, the California Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) provided notice to the public of proposed emergency cannabis regulations that would make it mandatory for cannabis businesses to post their unique Quick Response Code (QR Code) certificate in storefront windows and carry it with them while transporting or delivering cannabis.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
